FuncDef: The undo mpls te srlg all-config command is used to remove the SRLG configuration on all interfaces of the MPLS TE node.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the undo mpls te srlg all-config command is configured on the TE, the mpls te srlg command will be deleted on all interfaces of the node. The mpls te srlg path-calculation command in the MPLS view will not be deleted.
